\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 81358}

\subsection*{Whew! Passed}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Passed}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 200 mg &  & Cocaine & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 163.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
This is for people worrying about cocaine and a DT.  I had to get a background check/drug test for my job.  Failure would've ruined my life so I was anxious.  For cocaine I was 84 hours clean and passed.  I had to get a background check through the company Hireright and the whole process took 8 days.  This is just for reference for those worrying about not receiving results.  I worried my rear off thinking the long wait was bad.



Body type 5'9', athletic, $\sim$10-15\% body fat 163 pounds.
